ISSUE.TITLE: 'When: Local: false' not working during local build
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Steps to reproduce: drone.yml: ``` yaml pipeline: not_local: when: local: false image: alpine:3.6 commands: - echo "hello world" ``` Output: ``` sh drone exec [not_local:0] + echo "hello world" [not_local:1] hello world ``` Expected: the step not to run when running drone locally. This is very useful for plugins.
